description:
PANTHEON X provides a matching platform for investors to meet with professional traders who also want to communicate with investors. Past track records and trading performance are recorded on blockchain, and investors can find this reliable and transparent information, so they can shop trading strategies and advisors that suit investors’ tastes. 
In addition to providing the social matching platform, PANTHEON X offers advanced tools including a customer management platform and a trading solution for institutional investors. The PANTHEON X token, XPN, is used to use these solutions and to access a variety of contents.
name: PANTHEON X
